name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on bench, grip bar slightly wider than shoulders. Lower bar to chest, press up explosively. Keep feet flat on floor, maintain arch in back.

name: Incline Bench Press (Barbell)
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline. Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders. Lower to upper chest, press up.

name: Incline Bench Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline. Hold dumbbells at shoulder level, press up and together. Lower with control.

name: Incline Bench Press (Smith Machine)
instructions: Set bench to incline in Smith machine. Press bar from upper chest, controlled movement.

name: Decline Bench Press (Barbell)
instructions: Secure feet in decline bench. Grip bar, lower to lower chest, press up. Focus on lower pec engagement.

name: Bench Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on flat bench, hold dumbbells at shoulder level. Press up and together, lower with control.

name: Chest Fly (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on bench, hold dumbbells above chest with slight bend in arms. Lower in wide arc, squeeze together at top.

name: Chest Fly (Cable)
instructions: Set cables at chest height. Stand between, pull handles together in front. Squeeze chest at peak contraction.

name: Chest Fly (Machine)
instructions: Sit in pec deck machine. Adjust seat so handles align with chest. Push handles together, squeeze, return slowly.

name: Butterfly (Pec Deck)
instructions: Sit in pec deck, push handles together. Squeeze chest muscles, return slowly with control.

name: Push-Up
instructions: Start in plank position, hands slightly wider than shoulders. Lower body until chest nearly touches floor, push up.

name: Diamond Push-Up
instructions: Form diamond with hands, perform push-up. Targets triceps and inner chest.

name: Dips
instructions: Support body on parallel bars. Lower until shoulders below elbows, push up. Lean forward for chest emphasis.

name: Back Squat
instructions: Bar on upper traps. Feet shoulder-width, toes slightly out. Descend until thighs parallel, drive up through heels.

name: Front Squat
instructions: Bar on front delts, crossed arms or clean grip. Keep torso upright, squat deep. Emphasizes quads.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Rear foot elevated on bench. Hold dumbbells, lunge down on front leg. Keep front knee behind toes.

name: Walking Lunge
instructions: Step forward into lunge, push off back foot, alternate legs. Keep torso upright throughout.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in leg press, feet shoulder-width on platform. Lower until knees at 90 degrees, press up. Don't lock knees.

name: Leg Press Horizontal (Machine)
instructions: Horizontal leg press machine. Push platform away, lower with control. Full range of motion.

name: Hack Squat
instructions: Position in hack squat machine, shoulders against pads. Squat down, drive up through heels.

name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit in leg extension machine. Extend legs against resistance, squeeze quads at top, lower slowly.

name: Leg Extension (Machine)
instructions: Sit in leg extension machine. Extend legs, squeeze quads at top, lower with control.

name: Leg Curl (Lying)
instructions: Lie face down, curl heels toward glutes. Squeeze hamstrings, lower with control.

name: Lying Leg Curl (Machine)
instructions: Lie face down in leg curl machine. Curl heels to glutes, squeeze hamstrings, lower slowly.

name: Leg Curl (Seated)
instructions: Sit in leg curl machine. Curl heels toward glutes, squeeze hamstrings, lower slowly.

name: Seated Leg Curl (Machine)
instructions: Sit in leg curl machine. Curl heels toward glutes, squeeze hamstrings, lower with control.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hold bar, slight knee bend. Hinge at hips, lower bar along legs. Feel stretch in hamstrings, return to standing.

name: Stiff-Leg Deadlift
instructions: Keep legs straight, hinge at hips. Lower bar, feel hamstring stretch, return to standing.

name: Calf Raise (Standing)
instructions: Stand on platform, raise onto toes. Squeeze calves at top, lower slowly for full stretch.

name: Standing Calf Raise (Machine)
instructions: Stand in calf raise machine. Raise onto toes, squeeze calves, lower for full stretch.

name: Calf Raise (Seated)
instructions: Sit in calf raise machine, place balls of feet on platform. Raise onto toes, squeeze, lower.

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit in seated calf raise machine. Raise onto toes, squeeze calves, lower with control.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Feet hip-width, bar over mid-foot. Hinge and bend knees, grip bar. Drive through heels, extend hips and knees simultaneously.

name: Conventional Deadlift
instructions: Standard deadlift stance, feet hip-width. Hinge and squat to bar, drive up keeping bar close to body.

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Wide stance, toes pointed out. Grip bar inside legs. Drive up, emphasize quads and inner thighs.

name: Bent-Over Row (Barbell)
instructions: Hinge at hips, row bar to lower chest/upper abs. Squeeze lats, lower with control.

name: Bent-Over Row (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hinge at hips, row dumbbells to sides. Squeeze shoulder blades together, lower slowly.

name: T-Bar Row
instructions: Straddle T-bar, row to chest. Squeeze lats and rhomboids, lower with control.

name: Chest Supported Row
instructions: Sit with chest against pad. Row handles to sides, squeeze shoulder blades, lower slowly.

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Sit with legs slightly bent. Row handle to lower chest/upper abs, squeeze lats, return slowly.

name: Seated Cable Row - V Grip
instructions: Use V-grip handle. Row to lower chest, focus on mid-back and rhomboids.

name: Seated Cable Row - V Grip (Cable)
instructions: Sit with V-grip handle. Row to lower chest, squeeze mid-back muscles, return slowly.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Grip bar wider than shoulders. Pull to upper chest, squeeze lats, return slowly with control.

name: Lat Pulldown (Machine)
instructions: Grip bar wider than shoulders. Pull to upper chest, squeeze lats, lower with control.

name: Lat Pulldown (Cable)
instructions: Use cable machine with lat pulldown bar. Pull to upper chest, focus on lat engagement.

name: Pull-Up
instructions: Hang from bar, pull body up until chin over bar. Lower with control. Use assistance if needed.

name: Chin-Up
instructions: Underhand grip, pull up until chin over bar. Emphasizes biceps and lats.

name: Wide-Grip Pull-Up
instructions: Wide overhand grip, pull up. Emphasizes upper lats and teres major.

name: Cable Pullover
instructions: Kneel or stand, pull cable from high position down and across body. Targets lats and serratus.

name: Lat Pushdown
instructions: Stand with cable at high position. Pull down and forward, engage lats and serratus.

name: Lats Crane
instructions: Use lat pulldown machine with wide grip. Pull to upper chest, focus on lat width.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Set cable at face height. Pull rope to face, external rotate at end. Targets rear delts and upper back.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Press bar from shoulder level overhead. Keep core tight, press straight up, lower with control.

name: Overhead Press (Barbell)
instructions: Press bar from shoulders overhead. Maintain tight core, press straight up.

name: Shoulder Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Press dumbbells from shoulder level overhead. Keep slight forward lean, press up together.

name: Seated Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit on bench, press dumbbells overhead. Maintain back support, press up together.

name: Shoulder Press (Machine Plates)
instructions: Sit in shoulder press machine. Press handles overhead, lower with control.

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Raise dumbbells to sides until parallel to floor. Slight forward lean, lower slowly.

name: Lateral Raise (Dumbbell)
instructions: Raise dumbbells to sides, parallel to floor. Slight forward lean, lower with control.

name: Lateral Raise (Cable)
instructions: Stand with cable at side. Raise arm to side, slight forward lean. Targets medial deltoids.

name: Front Raise
instructions: Raise dumbbells forward until parallel to floor. Lower with control, alternate or together.

name: Rear Delt Reverse Fly
instructions: Bend forward, raise dumbbells to sides. Squeeze rear delts, lower slowly.

name: Rear Delt Reverse Fly (Cable)
instructions: Set cables at shoulder height. Cross arms, pull cables apart. Squeeze rear delts.

name: Upright Row
instructions: Pull bar to upper chest, elbows high. Targets delts and traps. Keep bar close to body.

name: Upright Row (Cable)
instructions: Use cable with straight bar. Pull to upper chest, elbows high, lower slowly.

name: Shrugs
instructions: Hold bar at sides, raise shoulders up. Squeeze traps at top, lower slowly.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Curl bar to shoulders, squeeze biceps. Keep elbows stationary, lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Curl
instructions: Curl dumbbells to shoulders. Can alternate or do together. Squeeze biceps at top.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Neutral grip, curl dumbbells. Targets brachialis and brachioradialis. Lower slowly.

name: Hammer Curl (Cable)
instructions: Use cable with rope or straight bar, neutral grip. Curl to shoulders, squeeze.

name: Preacher Curl
instructions: Sit at preacher bench, curl bar. Isolates biceps, prevents swinging. Lower slowly.

name: Preacher Curl (Barbell)
instructions: Sit at preacher bench, curl bar. Isolates biceps completely, lower with control.

name: Preacher Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit at preacher bench with dumbbell. Curl one arm at a time, isolate biceps.

name: Bicep Curl (Cable)
instructions: Stand with cable at low position. Curl handle to shoulder, squeeze biceps, lower.

name: Incline Bicep Curl (Cable)
instructions: Set bench to incline, use cable. Curl with extended arm position for full stretch.

name: Seated Incline Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit on incline bench, curl dumbbells. Extended arm position stretches biceps fully.

name: Concentration Curl
instructions: Sit, rest elbow on inner thigh. Curl dumbbell, isolate biceps. Alternate arms.

name: EZ Bar Biceps Curl
instructions: Use EZ bar for wrist comfort. Curl to shoulders, squeeze biceps, lower slowly.

name: Triceps Pushdown
instructions: Push cable down until arms extended. Squeeze triceps, return slowly. Keep elbows at sides.

name: Triceps Rope Pushdown
instructions: Use rope attachment. Push down, spread rope at bottom. Squeeze triceps, return slowly.

name: Triceps Extension (Cable)
instructions: Cable behind head, extend arms overhead. Squeeze triceps, lower slowly.

name: Overhead Triceps Extension (Cable)
instructions: Cable at low position, pull overhead. Extend arms, squeeze triceps, lower.

name: Over Head Tricep Extension
instructions: Cable overhead, extend arms down. Squeeze triceps at bottom, return slowly.

name: Skullcrusher
instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to forehead. Extend arms, squeeze triceps. Keep elbows stationary.

name: Skullcrusher (Barbell)
instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to forehead. Extend arms, squeeze triceps, lower with control.

name: Skullcrusher (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on bench, lower dumbbells to sides of head. Extend arms, squeeze triceps.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
instructions: Narrow grip on bench press. Targets triceps. Lower to chest, press up.

name: Dip
instructions: Support on parallel bars. Lower until shoulders below elbows, push up. Targets triceps and chest.

name: Plank
instructions: Hold body in straight line, support on forearms and toes. Engage core, breathe normally.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Support on one forearm and side of foot. Hold body straight, engage obliques.

name: Cable Crunch
instructions: Kneel with cable overhead. Crunch down, bringing elbows to knees. Squeeze abs.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs to parallel or higher. Lower with control, engage lower abs.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit, lean back slightly. Rotate torso side to side, hold weight for resistance.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Kneel, roll wheel forward while maintaining straight line. Roll back to start.

name: Dead Bug
instructions: Lie on back, raise arms and legs. Lower opposite arm and leg, return. Maintain core engagement.

name: Farmer's Walk
instructions: Carry heavy dumbbells, walk for distance or time. Maintain posture, engage core.

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Hinge at hips, swing kettlebell to chest height. Drive through hips, control descent.

name: Sam Sulek Curl
instructions: High cable position, curl with extended arm. Full stretch and contraction for biceps.
